title: June 02 - Spliced Takes Continued
content: Due for release from the Rock 'n' Roll Majesty import-label is the 4 CD longbow "Spliced Takes Continued". This set is a limited numbered edition set of 350 copies. The Searcher DVD Due for release from Sony Pictures on October 16, 2018 is the DVD release of "The Searcher".  Synopsis: From the archives of Graceland and EP Priscilla Presley, this 2-part documentary style film focuses on Elvis, the artist and musician. Containing never-before-seen footage and music recordings, the mini-series follows Elvis from his childhood through to his final recording session in 1977. Weekend Charts Australia (ARIA chart week June 4 to 10, 2018) Catalogue Album Chart: The King #42 (re-entry)  Music DVD Chart: The King of Rock 'n' Roll #21 (re-entry) Belgium - Flanders (Ultratop chart week June 2 to 8, 2018) Top 200 Album Chart: The Searcher #154 (dropped for his 7th chart week from #44) UK (Official Chart Company chart week Juni 1 to 7, 2018) Irish Albums (Top 50): ELV1S 30 #1 Hits #46  UK Soundtrack Albums: The Searcher #27 (climbed from #29) (Source: Rock 'n' Roll Majesty / Laser Freak)
contentWithMarkup:
Due for release from the Rock 'n' Roll Majesty import-label is the 4 CD longbow "Spliced Takes Continued". This set is a limited numbered edition set of 350 copies.

 The Searcher DVD

 Due for release from Sony Pictures on October 16, 2018 is the DVD release of "The Searcher". 

 Synopsis:
From the archives of Graceland and EP Priscilla Presley, this 2-part documentary style film focuses on Elvis, the artist and musician. Containing never-before-seen footage and music recordings, the mini-series follows Elvis from his childhood through to his final recording session in 1977.

 Weekend Charts

 Australia (ARIA chart week June 4 to 10, 2018)
  • Catalogue Album Chart: The King #42 (re-entry) 
  • Music DVD Chart: The King of Rock 'n' Roll #21 (re-entry)
Belgium - Flanders (Ultratop chart week June 2 to 8, 2018)
  • Top 200 Album Chart: The Searcher #154 (dropped for his 7th chart week from #44)
UK (Official Chart Company chart week Juni 1 to 7, 2018)
  • Irish Albums (Top 50): ELV1S 30 #1 Hits #46 
  • UK Soundtrack Albums: The Searcher #27 (climbed from #29)
(Source: Rock 'n' Roll Majesty / Laser Freak)
